snippet: A man was found dead in the Hollywood Hills home of oil fortune heir Andrew Getty, and his parents confirmed that it was Mr. Getty, the 47-year-old grandson of J. Paul Getty.
abstract: Andrew Getty, 47-year-old grandson of Getty Oil founder J Paul Getty, is found dead in his Hollywood Hills home.
lead_paragraph: A man was found dead in the Hollywood Hills home of oil fortune heir Andrew Getty, and his parents confirmed that it was Mr. Getty, the 47-year-old grandson of J. Paul Getty.

headline.main: Getty Grandson, 47, Found Dead Inside His Home
headline.print_headline: Getty Grandson, 47, Found Dead Inside His Home
